result.eng: I was cutting wood all morning.

result.eng: I was there for a month.

result.orig: Bhí mé ann ar feadh míosa
result.html: Bhí mé ann ar feadh míosaI was there for a month.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ann ar feaḋ míosaI was there for a month.

result.eng: I was there for a week.

result.html: Bhí mé ann ar feadh seachtaineI was there for a week.

result.eng: I was employed by an American company for five years.
result.ga: Bhí mé fostaithe ag comhlacht Meiriceánach ar feadh cúig bliana

result.eng: What did you do during your life until now?

result.orig: Cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seo
result.html: Cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?

result.eng: We stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ga: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa

result.eng: Millions of text messages were sent over Christmas.
result.ga: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na Nollag

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise

result.eng: I was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae

result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé i mo ẛeasaṁ taoḃ ṫiar den ċuntar ar feaḋ an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.

result.eng: I would like to rent a house for a week in the month of April.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom teach a thógáil ar cíos ar feadh seachtaine i mí Aibreáin
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom teach a thógáil ar cíos ar feadh seachtaine i mí Aibreáin

result.eng: We were in Ros an Mhíl for two weeks in the month of August.
result.ga: Bhí muid i Ros an Mhíl ar feadh coicíse i mí Lúnasa

result.html: Bhí muid i Ros an Mhíl ar feadh coicíse i mí LúnasaWe were in Ros an Mhíl for two weeks in the month of August.

result.eng: Will we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
result.ga: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad
result.orig: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin

result.ponchtml: D'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: The affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ga: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.orig: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.html: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cás ina ṗríoṁscéal ag na meáin ḟadḃunaiṫe ar feaḋ breis is seaċtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne

result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.

result.eng: I was in hiding for a month.

result.html: Bhí mise ar feadh míosa ar mo sheachnadhI was in hiding for a month.
